events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer role, highlighting experience with Java and cloud infrastructure.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as software, developer, and cloud technologies.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
Initial phone screening with the candidate went well, confirming relevant experience in software development and DevOps practices.
Candidate confirmed availability for the next round of interviews and expressed enthusiasm about the role and company culture.
Technical interview was scheduled with the candidate for the following week to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering principles and practical coding abilities.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and candidate expectations.
HR interview concluded positively with the candidate showing alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the role.
An employment offer was extended to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience.
